result.description: Tom Wilson (1) Tip-In, assists: Matt Niskanen (1), Alex Ovechkin (1)
Pierre-Luc Dubois (1) Wrist Shot, assists: Artemi Panarin (5), Seth Jones (3)

items.headline: 5 Keys: Capitals at Blue Jackets, Game 3
items.subhead: Holtby starts for Washington; Columbus must control emotions

items.title: Broadcast Start
items.description: Broadcast Start

items.title: Period Start
items.description: Period Start

items.title: Shot
items.description: Devante Smith-Pelly Wrist Shot saved by Sergei Bobrovsky

highlight.headline: Bobrovsky denies Smith-Pelly
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Devante Smith-Pelly collects a drop pass on the rush and fires a quick shot, but Sergei Bobrovsky makes a nice save early in the 1st

items.title: Shot
items.description: Jakub Vrana Wrist Shot saved by Sergei Bobrovsky

highlight.headline: Bobrovsky's glove save on Vrana
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Jakub Vrana looks to score in transition off a turnover, but Sergei Bobrovsky flashes the leather to deny him in the 1st period

items.title: Shot
items.description: Cam Atkinson Wrist Shot saved by Braden Holtby

items.title: Period End
items.description: End of 1st Period

items.title: Period Start
items.description: Period Start

items.title: Missed Shot
items.description: Josh Anderson - Goalpost

items.title: Shot
items.description: Boone Jenner Wrist Shot saved by Braden Holtby

items.title: Goal
items.description: Tom Wilson (1) Wrist Shot, assists: Matt Niskanen (1), Alex Ovechkin (1)

highlight.headline: Wilson scores on deflection
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Matt Niskanen snaps a shot from the point that Tom Wilson deflects in, giving the Capitals a 1-0 lead in the 2nd period

items.title: Shot
items.description: Matt Calvert Snap Shot saved by Braden Holtby

highlight.headline: Holtby's smooth glove save
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Matt Calvert gets behind the defense and unloads a shot at Braden Holtby, who makes a quick glove save midway through the 2nd

items.title: Goal
items.description: Pierre-Luc Dubois (1) Wrist Shot, assists: Artemi Panarin (5), Seth Jones (3)

highlight.headline: Dubois' first career playoff goal
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Pierre-Luc Dubois whips a shot from the circle over the shoulder of Braden Holtby for his first career playoff goal

items.title: Goal
items.description: John Carlson (1) Wrist Shot, assists: Nicklas Backstrom (5), Alex Ovechkin (2)

highlight.headline: Carlson's power-play goal
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Nicklas Backstrom sends the puck to John Carlson, who scores on a one-timer from the top of the circle during a two-man advantage

items.title: Shot
items.description: Alex Chiasson Slap Shot saved by Sergei Bobrovsky

items.title: Period End
items.description: End of 2nd Period

items.title: Period Start
items.description: Period Start

items.title: Goal
items.description: Artemi Panarin (2) Wrist Shot, assists: Cam Atkinson (2)

highlight.headline: Panarin ties it up in the 3rd
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Artemi Panarin and Cam Atkinson pass the puck back and forth on an odd-man rush before Panarin fires it home to tie the game at 2

items.title: Shot
items.description: Matt Calvert Wrist Shot saved by Braden Holtby

items.title: Shot
items.description: Michal Kempny Wrist Shot saved by Sergei Bobrovsky

items.title: Shot
items.description: Artemi Panarin saved by Braden Holtby

highlight.headline: Holtby stones Panarin
highlight.blurb: R1, Gm3: Artemi Panarin darts down the wing and gets a shot off from the doorstep, but Braden Holtby makes a pad save to keep the game tied
